entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 99.0 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SSE 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
